meanings.definition: A whitecomb is a tool used for grooming or styling hair.
meanings.sent1: I used a whitecomb to style my hair for the party.
meanings.sent2: She always carries a whitecomb in her purse for quick touch-ups.
meanings.sent3: The whitecomb magically transformed his messy hair into a stylish look.
meanings.sent4: Her whitecomb was like a magic wand, turning tangled hair into smooth waves.
meanings.sent5: The whitecomb glided through her hair, creating a perfect hairstyle.

meanings.definition: Whitecombs can refer to the white crest of foam on top of waves in the ocean.
meanings.sent1: The whitecombs on the waves sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Surfers love riding the waves with whitecombs at the top.
meanings.sent3: The playful dolphins jumped through the whitecombs, splashing water everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The whitecombs looked like a crown on the majestic ocean waves.
meanings.sent5: The whitecombs danced on the waves, creating a beautiful sight.
